attributes.action: Scrap the tv licence and make the BBC move to subscription only.
attributes.additional_details: The tv licence is a thing of the past and the BBC needs to move onto a streaming platform like Netflix, Prime, Disney.
attributes.background: Allow freedom of choice what an individual wants to watch and not have it forced upon them.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Abolish the tv licence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701068
